means: （尤指镜片）能放大远处物体的

sentence.Network_en: Any decent shot with telescopic sights could pick us off at random.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何借助望远镜瞄准器的像样射手都可以随意把我们逐个干掉。

sentence.Network_en: a rifle with a telescopic sight
sentence.Network_cn: 装有望远瞄准器的步枪

sentence.Network_en: The rattailed maggot, for example, possesses a'snorklelike " telescopic air tube.
sentence.Network_cn: 例如长尾蛆就有一个 “ 通气管 ” 似的伸缩吸气管.

list.abs: reflecting stereoscope 反射立体镜reflecting telescope 反射望远镜reflection altimeter 反射测高计
红外望远镜（infrared telescope）接收天体的红外辐射的望远镜。外形结构与光学镜大同小异，有的可兼作红外观测和光学观测。
望远镜英文_百度知道 ... sighting telescope 瞄准镜 solar telescope 太阳望远镜 solid schmidt telescope 立体施密特望远镜.
在物理常用的英文单词_百度知道 ... refracting angle 折射棱角 refracting telescope 折射望远镜 refraction 折射.

entry.tran: (镜头、仪器)能望远的，望远镜的
entry.def: Telescopic lenses and instruments are used to make things seem larger and nearer, and are usually longer than others of the same type.

example.ex: ...a sporting rifle fitted with a telescopic sight.
example.tran: 安装了望远镜瞄准器的猎枪

entry.def: A telescopic object is made of cylindrical sections that fit or slide into each other, so that it can be made longer or shorter, for example to save space when it is not being used.

example.tran: 这把新型的伸缩式轻便梯子

sentences.sentence: "a bright star with a telescopic companion"

means.word_mean: 3. having parts that slide one within another;

auth_sentence.content: Telescopic discovery of a star which mathematical calculations have already prophesied.
auth_sentence.res_content: Telescopic discovery of a star which mathematical calculations have already prophesied.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Telescopic discovery of a star which mathematical calculations have already prophesied.

auth_sentence.content: This involves inserting a very thin and flexible telescopic probe up the urethra - the tube through which urine is passed.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This involves inserting a very thin and flexible telescopic probe up the urethra - the tube through which urine is passed.
